comments:
I got an "Exception Occurred during problem detection" in the "Error log" view 
when I tried to save a file containing the following (buggy) code :

public class Truc {
    void met() {
        String a = "ok";
        if (a = null && a.length() > 0);
    }
}

Note : the bug is that I forgot the exclamation mark in "a != null" condition.
